REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - MOODY'S CUTS TEXAS AIR In New York item headlined "Moody's Cuts Texas Air <TEX>, Affirms Eastern," Moody's corrects that it lowered Texas Air's senior unsecured debt to B-3 from B-2, not the company's senior secured debt. Reuter
